createdAt.description: The date and time when the product was created.

descriptionHtml.description: The product's description in HTML format.

handle.description: The unique URL-friendly handle of the product.

id.description: The unique identifier of the product.

isGiftCard.description: Indicates whether the product is a gift card.

legacyResourceId.description: The legacy resource ID of the product.

mediaCount.description: The total count of media (images/videos) associated with the product.

onlineStorePreviewUrl.description: The URL for previewing the product on the online store.

onlineStoreUrl.description: The URL of the product on the online store.

options.description: Represents various options available for the product

id.description: The unique identifier of the option.

values.description: Contains the different values for the options

items.description: The possible values for the option.

productType.description: The type or category of the product.

publishedAt.description: The date and time when the product was published.

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop where the product is listed.

tags.description: Contains tags associated with the product

items.description: The tags associated with the product.

title.description: The title or name of the product.

totalInventory.description: The total inventory count of the product.

totalVariants.description: The total number of variants available for the product.

tracksInventory.description: Indicates whether inventory tracking is enabled for the product.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the product was last updated.

vendor.description: The vendor or manufacturer of the product.
